short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension adds row numbers to all HTML tables in the left-most column.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful for easily counting rows in a large table (e.g., on Wikipedia) and tracking the original position of each row in the table after sorting.
